title: modin.pandas.Series.var | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Return unbiased variance over requested axis.
Normalized by N-1 by default. This can be changed using the ddof argument.
axis ({index (0), columns (1)}) – For Series this parameter is unused and defaults to 0.

skipna (bool, default True) – Exclude NA/null values. If an entire row/column is NA, the result
will be NA.

ddof (int, default 1) – Delta Degrees of Freedom. The divisor used in calculations is N - ddof,
where N represents the number of elements.
numeric_only (bool, default False) – If True, Include only float, int, boolean columns. Not implemented for Series.
Alternatively, ddof=0 can be set to normalize by N instead of N-1:
